<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;RT audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o comb.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
gamix init 0
instr 1
kcps expon p5, p3, p4 asig vco2 0.3, kcps outs asig, asig
gamix = gamix + asig
endin
instr 99
krvt = 3.5 ilpt = 0.1 aleft comb gamix, krvt, ilpt aright comb gamix, krvt, ilpt*.2 outs aleft, aright
clear gamix ; clear mixer
endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 3 20 2000 i 1 5 .01 440 440
i 99 0 8 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
